resources.string: The Condroid Remote Management System is a system that provides functionality to manage remotely located devices by an Android smart phone through GSM networks. This system support user-friendly GUI for end-users and this makes users control remote devices in a convenient way.
Members: Amir Roozbeh, Ekambar Selvakumar, Ericson Ferdinand Pasaribu, Jung Chang Su, Mahsa Tabatabaei and Rene Pavez Flores
